description: Pierre Fitch has to go to Spain for business. It was supposed to only be for a few days, but it turns into much longer. In the meantime Pierre's sexy boyfriend, Allen King, waits at home anxiously. Allen just wants to have Pierre's lips and tongue wrapped around his huge dick. When Pierre finally arrives home, Allen slams Pierre's hungry hole, and then has his own ass ravaged by Pierre's big, meaty cock.
title: 3300 Miles
